text: Add file name as last column of CSV file
I have a Python script which modifies a CSV file to add the filename as the last column:

code:
import sys
import glob

for filename in glob.glob(sys.argv[1]):
    file = open(filename)
    data = [line.rstrip() + "," + filename for line in file]
    file.close()

    file = open(filename, "w")
    file.write("\n".join(data))
    file.close()

text: Unfortunately, it also adds the filename to the header (first) row of the file.
I would like the string "ID" added to the header instead.
Can anybody suggest how I could do this?
